about_the_game:
Key Features

  • Multiplayer
    - Create or join multiplayer games. Play with the default settings, or customize the game by changing everything from how fast the game will play, to how powerful each individual weapon is.

  • Destructible spacecrafts
    - Every part of a spacecraft can be destroyed, so it's important to protect key components such as thrusters, weapons, and the reactor.

  • Ship building
    - Build Your Own Spacecraft: Build spacecrafts using various components such as thrusters, weapons, shield generators, a reactor, and blocks of different shapes and strengths.
    - Use Existing Designs: If you don't feel like building from scratch, or if other players have more powerful spacecrafts, you can copy and use any spacecraft design from players in your current game, to level the playing field.

  • Weapons
    - The game offers a wide range of weapons and gadgets, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. You can switch weapons anytime during the game to adjust your playstyle or adapt to new situations.

  • Powerups
    - Fight to control specific zones on the map and gain access to powerups. These weapons and abilities are extremely powerful and can have a huge impact in battles if used effectively.

  • Physics driven gameplay
    - Movement in the game is driven by physics, so your spacecraft's center of mass and placement of thrusters will influence how easily you can pilot it. Additionally, some projectiles and objects in the environment are also affected by physics.

  • Map Editor
    - Get creative and create custom maps in an easy to use map editor. Share and play your maps with other players.

  • Bots

    - Play alone, or cooperate with friends to take on challenging bots together.

short_description: Build spacecrafts and fight with or against your friends! This game offers physics driven gameplay, with a variety of weapons and powerups. Slice your enemies in half with a laser beam, or erase them from existence with a black hole bomb!
